name: Microsoft Excel 365 Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Microsoft Excel 365 Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Microsoft Excel API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Microsoft Excel API | (必填项)

notice.displayName: This node connects to the Microsoft 365 cloud platform. Use the 'Extract from File' and 'Convert to File' nodes to directly manipulate spreadsheet files (.xls, .csv, etc). More info.
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node connects to the Microsoft 365 cloud platform. Use the 'Extract from File' and 'Convert to File' nodes to directly manipulate spreadsheet files (.xls, .csv, etc). More info.

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: workbook
available_options: Table (值: table) - Represents an Excel table
Workbook (值: workbook) - A workbook is the top level object which contains one or more worksheets
Sheet (值: worksheet) - A sheet is a grid of cells which can contain data, tables, charts, etc

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll
available_options: Append (值: append) - Append data to sheet
Append or Update (值: upsert) - Append a new row or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)
Clear (值: clear) - Clear sheet
Delete (值: deleteWorksheet) - Delete sheet
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get a list of sheets
Get Rows (值: readRows) - Retrieve a list of sheet rows
Update (值: update) - Update rows of a sheet or sheet range

workbook.name: workbook
workbook.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workbook | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

worksheet.name: worksheet
worksheet.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sheet | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

table.name: table
table.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

dataMode.name: dataMode
dataMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data Mode | 默认值: define
available_options: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns (值: autoMap) - Use when node input properties match destination column names
Map Each Column Below (值: define) - Set the value for each destination column

data.name: data
data.description: Raw values for the specified range as array of string arrays in JSON format. Should match the specified range: one array item for each row.
data.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data | 作用: Raw values for the specified range as array of string arrays in JSON format. Should match the specified range: one array item for each row. | (必填项)

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi
fieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Values to Send | 默认值: {}
available_options: values (值: None)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: appendAfterSelectedRange (值: None) - Whether to append data after the selected range or used range
rawData (值: None) - Whether the data should be returned RAW instead of parsed into keys according to their header
dataProperty (值: None) - The name of the property into which to write the RAW data
updateAll (值: None) - Whether to update all matching rows or just the first match

selectRange.name: selectRange
selectRange.natural_language_description: 参数名: Select Range | 默认值: auto
available_options: Automatically (值: auto) - The whole used range on the selected sheet will be converted into a table
Manually (值: manual) - Select a range that will be converted into a table

range.name: range
range.description: The sheet range to read the data from specified using a A1-style notation, has to be specific e.g A1:B5, generic ranges like A:B are not supported. Leave blank to use whole used range in the sheet.
range.natural_language_description: 参数名: Range | 作用: The sheet range to read the data from specified using a A1-style notation, has to be specific e.g A1:B5, generic ranges like A:B are not supported. Leave blank to use whole used range in the sheet. | 提示: First row must contain column names

hasHeaders.name: hasHeaders
hasHeaders.description: Whether the range has column labels. When this property set to false Excel will automatically generate header shifting the data down by one row.
hasHeaders.natural_language_description: 参数名: Has Headers | 作用: Whether the range has column labels. When this property set to false Excel will automatically generate header shifting the data down by one row. | 默认值: True

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

rawData.name: rawData
rawData.description: Whether the data should be returned RAW instead of parsed into keys according to their header
rawData.natural_language_description: 参数名: RAW Data | 作用: Whether the data should be returned RAW instead of parsed into keys according to their header | 默认值: False

dataProperty.name: dataProperty
dataProperty.description: The name of the property into which to write the RAW data
dataProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data Property | 作用: The name of the property into which to write the RAW data | 默认值: data

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: fields (值: None) - A comma-separated list of the fields to include in the response

lookupColumn.name: lookupColumn
lookupColumn.description: The name of the column in which to look for value
lookupColumn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Lookup Column | 作用: The name of the column in which to look for value | (必填项)

lookupValue.name: lookupValue
lookupValue.description: The value to look for in column
lookupValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Lookup Value | 作用: The value to look for in column | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: name (值: None) - The name of the sheet to be added. The name should be unique. If not specified, Excel will determine the name of the new worksheet.

applyTo.name: applyTo
applyTo.natural_language_description: 参数名: Apply To | 默认值: All
available_options: All (值: All) - Clear data in cells and remove all formatting
Formats (值: Formats) - Clear formatting(e.g. font size, color) of cells
Contents (值: Contents) - Clear data contained in cells

useRange.name: useRange
useRange.natural_language_description: 参数名: Select a Range | 默认值: False

keyRow.name: keyRow
keyRow.description: Relative to selected 'Range', first row index is 0
keyRow.natural_language_description: 参数名: Header Row | 作用: Relative to selected 'Range', first row index is 0 | 提示: Index of the row which contains the column names | 默认值: 0

dataStartRow.name: dataStartRow
dataStartRow.description: Relative to selected 'Range', first row index is 0
dataStartRow.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Data Row | 作用: Relative to selected 'Range', first row index is 0 | 提示: Index of first row which contains the actual data | 默认值: 1

columnToMatchOn.name: columnToMatchOn
columnToMatchOn.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
columnToMatchOn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Column to match on | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | 提示: Used to find the correct row to update. Doesn't get changed.

valueToMatchOn.displayName: Value of Column to Match On
valueToMatchOn.name: valueToMatchOn
valueToMatchOn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value of Column to Match On
